attributes.action: Ration food & commodities during Coronavirus pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Panic buying has already cleared shelves and caused issues with supply and I have seen numerous examples of this impacting vulnerable members of our society. Only yesterday I was behind an elderly gentleman buying Ibuprofen for his arthritis because he couldn't get paracetamol, despite his Drs advice not to use ibuprofen.
attributes.background: Ration food and commodities to ensure fair distribution and protect reserves as there are many unknown factors with this pandemic and how long it will last
